analysis.key_quote: This rule will in no way improve performance, accountability or responsiveness in the civil service, and will have negative effects on the leadership and structure of every agency.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about its negative impact on the merit-based system, employee rights, and the potential for increased politicization within federal agencies. It emphasizes the detrimental effects on institutional knowledge and the overall effectiveness of the civil service.
